process

title: Laboratory Ordering Use Case

description: See OpenHIE Architecture V3 Section 4.5

preConditions: The patient visits their GP and shows signs of illness. The GP will order a set of tests to be performed.

postConditions: The patient's lab order is persisted in the Order Repository, and includes an updated status of `Completed` and order results.
